item.title: R + Python = Friends <3 :)
item.description: R and Python want to play together! Aww :’) Let’s get them a reticulate package so they can play. #R code chunk library(reticulate) #Python code chunk print("hello world") ## hello world x="dog" x ## 'dog' import re string1="We have to extract these numbers 12, 47, 48 The integers numbers are also interesting: 189 2036 314\',\' is a separator, so please extract these numbers 125,789,1450 and also these 564,90456 We like to offer you 7890$ per month in order to complete this task.
